bibl.title: Chamaileon: Biographie und Schriften περὶ τοῦ δεῖνα.
bibl.note: A close reading of the fragments of Chamaeleon's books On Pindar and On Stesichorus makes clear that they were biographies of poets in the ancient meaning of the word (and not commentaries on the works of these poets). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Stefan Schorn, Chamaileon: Biographie und Schriften περὶ τοῦ δεῖνα.

A close reading of the fragments of Chamaeleon's books On Pindar and On Stesichorus makes clear that they were biographies of poets in the ancient meaning of the word (and not commentaries on the works of these poets). - Avec résumé en anglais.
